00028 class VMStorageFile extends VMStorage {

00052         public function getFolder() {
00053                 return $this->pathFolder;
00054         }
00055         
00060         public function setFolder($newPathFolder) {
00061                 $this->pathFolder = $newPathFolder;
00062         }
00063         
00067         public function load() {
00068                 if( ( $dir = opendir($this->pathFolder) ) == FALSE ) {
00069                         echo "<error>Can't open '". $this->pathFolder ."'</error>\n";
00070                         return;
00071                 }
00072 
00074                 while( ( $folder = readdir($dir) ) !== false ) {
00075 
00077                         if( is_dir($this->pathFolder."/".$folder) && $folder != "." && $folder != ".." && $folder == ucfirst($folder) ) {
00078                                 $foldArr = new VoicemailFolder($folder);
00079                                 if( ( $vmFolder = @opendir($this->pathFolder ."/". $folder) ) == FALSE ) {
00080                                         echo "<error>Can't open \"". $this->pathFolder ."/". $folder ."\"</error>\n";
00081                                         continue;
00082                                 }
00083 
00085                                 $files = @scandir($this->pathFolder ."/". $folder);
00086                                 $files = @array_reverse($files);
00087                                 @array_pop($files);
00088                                 @array_pop($files);
00089                                 $files = @array_reverse($files);
00090                                 
00092                                 while( ( $file = @readdir($vmFolder) ) !== false ) {
00093                                 
00095                                         if( $file != "." && $file != ".." ) {
00096                                         
00098                                                 $arr = explode(".", $file);
00099                                                 if( $arr[count($arr)-1] == "txt" ) {
00101                                                         $fd = @fopen($this->pathFolder."/".$folder."/".$file, "r");
00102                                                         
00103                                                         if( $fd ) {
00104                                                                 $vm = new Voicemail(substr($file, 0, strrpos($file, ".")));
00105                                                                 $vm->setValue("id", substr($fi, 3, 4));
00106                                                                 while( ! feof($fd) ) {
00107                                                                         $buf = fgets($fd, 4096);
00108                                                                         $line = trim($buf);
00109                                                                         $pattern  = '/^(.+)=(.*)$/';
00110                                                                         if( preg_match($pattern, $line, $matches) ) {
00111                                                                                 $vm->setValue($matches[1], $matches[2]);
00112                                                                         }
00113                                                                 }
00115                                                                 $foldArr->addVMail($vm);
00116                                                                 fclose($fd);
00117                                                                 $tmp = $files;
00119                                                                 foreach( $tmp as $fi ) {
00120                                                                         if( strcmp(substr($fi, 3, 4), substr($file, 3, 4)) == 0 && strcmp(substr($fi, -3, 3), "txt") != 0 ) {
00121                                                                                 $vm->addFormat($fi);
00122                                                                         }
00123                                                                 }
00124                                                         } // end if opened
00125                                                         else {
00126                                                                 echo "<error>Can't open ". $this->pathFolder."/".$folder."/".$file ."</error>";
00127                                                         }
00128                                                 } // end if text message
00129 
00130                                         } // end if not a directory
00131                                 } // end while 2
00132                                 array_push($this->lstFolders, $foldArr);
00133                                 @closedir($vmFolder);
00134                         
00135                         } // end if is a directory but neither "." nor ".."
00136                 } // end while 1
00137                 @closedir($dir);
00138                 sort($this->lstFolders);
00139                 return $this->lstFolders;
00140         }

00144

00153         public function getSound($folder, $voicemail) {
00154                 foreach( $this->lstFolders as $fol ) {  
00155                         if( strcmp($fol->getName(), $folder) == 0 ) {
00156                                 $vm = $fol->getVMByName($voicemail);
00157                                 if( $vm != NULL ) {
00158                                         $arr = $vm->getFormats();
00159                                         foreach( $arr as $file ) {
00160                                                 $basename = substr($file, strrpos($file, ".")+1, strlen($file));
00161                                                 echo "<sound folder=\"". $folder ."\" file=\"". $voicemail ."\" format=\"". $basename ."\">";
00162                                                 //echo "<a href=\"". $this->pathFolder ."/". $folder ."/". $file ."\">$file</a>";
00163                                                 $handle = @fopen($this->pathFolder ."/". $folder ."/". $file, "r");
00164                                                 $contents = @fread($handle, filesize($this->pathFolder ."/". $folder ."/". $file));
00165                                                 fclose($handle);
00166                                                 echo base64_encode($contents);
00167                                                 echo "</sound>\n";
00168                                         }
00169                                         return TRUE;
00170                                 }
00171                         }
00172                 }
00173                 echo "<error-message>No file found</error-message>\n";
00174                 return FALSE;
00175         }
00176         
00184         public function rename($folderName, $oldName, $newName) {
00185                 foreach( $this->lstFolders as $fol ) {  
00186                         if( strcmp($fol->getName(), $folderName) == 0 ) {
00187                                 $vm = $fol->getVMByName($oldName);
00188                                 if( $vm != NULL ) {
00189                                         if( ! rename($this->pathFolder ."/". $folderName ."/". $oldName .".txt", $this->pathFolder ."/". $folderName ."/". $newName .".txt") ) {
00190                                                 echo "<error-message>". $oldname ." can't be renamed</error-message>";
00191                                         }
00192                                         $arr = $vm->getFormats();
00193                                         foreach( $arr as $file ) {
00194                                                 $basename = substr($file, strrpos($file, ".")+1, strlen($file));
00195                                                 $old = $this->pathFolder ."/". $folderName ."/". $oldName .".". $basename;
00196                                                 $new = $this->pathFolder ."/". $folderName ."/". $newName .".". $basename;
00197                                                 if( ! rename($old, $new) ) {
00198                                                         echo "<error-message>". $old ." can't be renamed</error-message>";
00199                                                 }
00200                                         }
00201                                         $fol->rename($oldName, $newName);
00202                                         return TRUE;
00203                                 }
00204                         }
00205                 }
00206                 echo "<error-message>Voicemail ". $oldName ." not found</error-message>";
00207                 return FALSE;
00208         }

00215         public function deleteFolder( $folder ) {
00216                 foreach( $this->lstFolders as $fol ) {  
00217                         if( strcmp($fol->getName(), $folder) == 0 ) {
00218                                 foreach( $fol->getListVM() as $vm ) {
00219                                         if( ! unlink($this->pathFolder ."/". $folder ."/". $vmName .".txt") ) {
00220                                                 echo "<error-message>". $vm ." wasn't deleted</error-message>";
00221                                         }
00222                                         $arr = $vm->getFormats();
00223                                         foreach( $arr as $file ) {
00224                                                 $basename = substr($file, strrpos($file, ".")+1, strlen($file) );
00225                                                 if( ! unlink($this->pathFolder ."/". $folder ."/". $vmName .".". $basename) ) {
00226                                                         echo "<error-message>". $file ." wasn't deleted</error-message>";
00227                                                 }
00228                                         }
00229                                 }
00230                                 return TRUE;
00231                         }
00232                 }
00233                 echo "<error-message>File ". $vmName ." not found</error-message>";
00234                 return FALSE;
00235         }
00236         
00243         public function delete($folder, $vmName) {
00244                 foreach( $this->lstFolders as $fol ) {  
00245                         if( strcmp($fol->getName(), $folder) == 0 ) {
00246                                 $vm = $fol->getVMByName($vmName);
00247                                 if( $vm != NULL ) {
00248                                         if( ! unlink($this->pathFolder ."/". $folder ."/". $vmName .".txt") ) {
00249                                                 echo "<error-message>". $vm ." wasn't deleted</error-message>";
00250                                         }
00251                                         $arr = $vm->getFormats();
00252                                         foreach( $arr as $file ) {
00253                                                 $basename = substr($file, strrpos($file, ".")+1, strlen($file));
00254                                                 if( ! unlink($this->pathFolder ."/". $folder ."/". $vmName .".". $basename) ) {
00255                                                         echo "<error-message>". $file ." wasn't deleted</error-message>";
00256                                                 }
00257                                         }
00258                                         return TRUE;
00259                                 }
00260                         }
00261                 }
00262                 echo "<error-message>File ". $vmName ." not found</error-message>";
00263                 return FALSE;
00264         }
